stories.title: Facebook’s Attack on Research Is Everyone's Problem

stories.text:
I recently had trouble getting my work orders in line and I was trying to implement a bunch of different systems that never seemed to live up to my vision of how I wanted to have my data structured. If you're in B@B marketing you understand that there are a lot of things that need to happen on any given day and cataloging and measuring those things all in one place is a dream come true.

This is the Notion start dashboard I build out for my team after watching a bunch of videos like: Thomas Frank Explains video on building a task manager from scratch https://youtu.be/32dLXdB4ozs and Kharma Medic's Notion Tour and Dashboard setup https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Vl2mP0Ita4&t=976s

Here is a link to the The B2B Marketing Notion Starter Dashboard: https://deserted-harrier-7a9.notion.site/B2B-Marketing-Dashboard-d26d80391c224dc791b83599931385f4
